recipe.title: "Toni's Marinated Olives"
ingredients: 2 cups drained brine-cured black olives such as Kalamata and/or Niçoise
2 cups drained brine-cured green olives such as picholine
1/2 cup thinly sliced fennel bulb (sometimes called anise)
instructions: Chop tarragon and thyme and mince anchovies. In a deep bowl stir together all ingredients except vinegar. Marinate olive mixture, covered and chilled, stirring occasionally, at least 6 hours and up to 3 days. Bring olive mixture to room temperature before proceeding.
To serve olives, transfer to a bowl with a slotted spoon and drizzle with vinegar to taste.
